info.title: Sim API - Token Info Endpoint
info.description: This API provides information about tokens across different EVM chains.

get.summary: Get EVM token information for a specified contract address (or the native token), on any chain.

parameters.name: X-Sim-Api-Key
parameters.description: Used for authenticating requests. Visit [Authentication](/#authentication) to learn how to create your API key.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The contract address of the token or 'native' for the native token of the chain

parameters.name: chain_ids
parameters.description: Specify exactly one chain. Accepts a single numeric chain ID (e.g. `?chain_ids=1`). Chain names are not accepted. See the [Supported Chains Tags](/evm/supported-chains#tags) section.

parameters.name: historical_prices
parameters.description: Request historical point-in-time prices. Provide a single integer or a comma-separated list of up to 3 integers representing hours in the past (e.g. `168` for 1 week ago or `720,168,24` for 1 month, 1 week, and 1 day ago). When present, each token includes a historical_prices array with one entry per offset.

three_offsets.summary: Three offsets (1 month, 1 week, 1 day ago)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: This endpoint returns up to the number of supported chains. See [Supported Chains](/evm/supported-chains) to learn more.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to paginate through result sets; this is a cursor being passed from the previous response, only use what the backend returns here

400.description: Bad Request - The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed data

500.description: Internal Server Error - A generic error occurred on the server.

decimals.description: The number of decimals for the token

price_usd.description: The price of the token in USD

historical_prices.description: Historical price points for the requested offsets. Only present when the historical_prices query parameter is provided.

total_supply.description: The total supply of the token

market_cap.description: The market capitalization of the token

contract_address.description: The contract address of the token or 'native' for the native token

tokens.description: Array of token information across different chains

next_offset.description: Pagination cursor for the next page of results
